snippet: REICH--Seymour: The Board of Trustees, residents and staff of the Hebrew Home at Riverdale mourn the loss of Seymour Reich who was a dedicated and thoughtful trustee for many years. Seymour was a giant in the Jewish community and we will miss his ...
lead_paragraph: REICH--Seymour: The Board of Trustees, residents and staff of the Hebrew Home at Riverdale mourn the loss of Seymour Reich who was a dedicated and thoughtful trustee for many years. Seymour was a giant in the Jewish community and we will miss his good counsel and friendship. The Hebrew Home at Riverdale by RiverSpring Health Jeffrey S. Maurer, Chairman Daniel Reingold, President and CEO 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  REICH, SEYMOUR: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES
